company_description: Razor is a global consumer holding company that partners with e-commerce merchants to acquire and scale brands. Razor uses significant growth capital with extensive e-commerce expertise in order to take these acquired merchants to the next stage of development. Razor focuses on specific product categories, long-term value enhancement, and first-class customer satisfaction.
founders: Christoph F. Gamon, Jonas Diezun, Oliver Dlugosch, Shrestha Chowdhury, Tushar Ahluwalia
seed_investors: GFC, Red Alpine, PreSight, MPGI, 468, FJLabs
embedding_text: Razor is a global consumer holding company that partners with e-commerce merchants to acquire and scale brands.
